title: Compromising
description: The exciting conclusion to Alex and Cassie's story!Sgt. Alex Cruz took the risk of his life when he pursued and established a relationship with Pfc. Cassie Bennett. Their secret was blown wide-open by one life altering event, leaving their futures in jeopardy.Escaping the shadows of Marine Corps orders should have been a sigh of relief, but quickly turns into their biggest challenge yet. Alex and Cassie must learn to navigate the road blocks thrown their way, while also figuring out how to function as a couple.They know what they want, but not always how to attain it. Life will test their love and their resolve, proving that their only option is to learn the art of COMPROMISING! **Contains violence, vulgarity and strong sexual content. Recommended for readers 18+.**
author: C.C.   Brown
